sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège duì yóu shí gè rén zǔchéng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette équipe est composée de dix personnes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This team is made up of ten people.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèyàng zuò bù gōngpíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce n'est pas juste de faire ainsi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is not fair.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ shuō de hěn yǒu dàolǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce que tu dis est très sensé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What you said makes a lot of sense.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó de rénkǒu hěn duō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La population de la Chine est très nombreuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China has a large population.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de zhàngfu shì yīshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son mari est médecin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Her husband is a doctor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiān chīfàn, ránhòu qù kàn diànyǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: D'abord manger, puis aller voir un film.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: First eat, then go see a movie.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng xiěxià nǐ de diànhuà shùzì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez écrire votre numéro de téléphone.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please write down your phone number.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐngwèn chēzhàn zài nǎge fāngxiàng?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Dans quelle direction se trouve la gare ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In which direction is the station?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yīqǐ qù ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons-y ensemble.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go together.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yǒu shénme hǎo fāngfǎ?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: As-tu une bonne méthode ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Do you have any good methods?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bīngxiāng lǐ yǒu hěn duō shíwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de nourriture dans le réfrigérateur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a lot of food in the refrigerator.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ de tiáojiàn hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les conditions ici sont très bonnes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The conditions here are very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gàosu wǒ nǐ de dìzhǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me donner votre adresse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please tell me your address.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你来这里的目的是什么？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ lái zhèlǐ de mùdì shì shénme?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel est le but de ta venue ici ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is the purpose of your coming here?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ kěyǐ zhíjiē gàosu wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu peux me le dire directement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You can tell me directly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān bā diǎn shàngbān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais au travail tous les jours à huit heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I go to work at eight every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ shōudào le yī fēng xìn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai reçu une lettre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I received a letter.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ gēge bǐ wǒ dà sān suì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon frère aîné a trois ans de plus que moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My older brother is three years older than me.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ wánquán tóngyì nǐ de kànfǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis entièrement d'accord avec ton point de vue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I completely agree with your view.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ dùzi hěn nánshòu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai mal au ventre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My stomach feels uncomfortable.
